statements: SELECT * FROM network_outages WHERE severity = 'HIGH';
SELECT outage_id, start_time, location FROM network_outages WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT start_time, location, duration FROM network_outages ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_outages WHERE severity = 'LOW' AND duration > '1 day';
SELECT outage_id, start_time, severity FROM network_outages WHERE start_time >= '2022-01-01' AND start_time <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM network_outages WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY start_time DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT outage_id, location, severity FROM network_outages WHERE severity = 'HIGH' ORDER BY start_time ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT AVG(duration) AS avg_duration, MAX(duration) AS max_duration FROM network_outages WHERE start_time >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00'
SELECT * FROM network_outages WHERE severity = 'LOW' OR severity = 'MEDIUM' ORDER BY start_time LIMIT 20
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS outage_count FROM network_outages GROUP BY location HAVING outage_count > 3
SELECT * FROM network_outages;
SELECT outage_id, outage_description FROM network_outages ORDER BY start_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_failures WHERE failure_type = 'Hardware';
SELECT outage_id, start_timestamp, end_timestamp FROM network_outages WHERE outage_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM network_failures ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_outages WHERE start_timestamp > '2021-01-01' AND end_timestamp < '2021-12-31'
SELECT outage_description FROM network_outages WHERE outage_id = 5
SELECT * FROM network_failures WHERE failure_type = 'Hardware' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT failure_id, failure_type FROM network_failures WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT start_timestamp, end_timestamp FROM network_outages WHERE outage_description LIKE '%planned%'
SELECT * FROM network_outages;
SELECT outage_id, outage_start, outage_end FROM network_outages ORDER BY outage_start DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_outages WHERE outage_type = 'Planned' ORDER BY outage_start ASC;
SELECT failure_id, failure_timestamp, failure_type FROM network_failures;
SELECT incident_id, incident_timestamp, incident_description FROM network_incidents ORDER BY incident_timestamp;
SELECT * FROM network_outages ORDER BY outage_start DESC, outage_end ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT outage_id, outage_type FROM network_outages WHERE outage_type = 'Planned' AND outage_description LIKE '%maintenance%' ORDER BY outage_start ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_failures WHERE failure_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY failure_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT incident_id, incident_timestamp, incident_description FROM network_incidents WHERE incident_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY incident_timestamp DESC;
SELECT outage_id, outage_start, outage_end, outage_type FROM network_outages WHERE outage_type IN ('Unplanned', 'Emergency') ORDER BY outage_start ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM network_outages ORDER BY start_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT outage_reason, affected_services FROM network_outages WHERE end_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT incident_id, incident_time, affected_network_element FROM incident_analysis WHERE analysis_results LIKE '%critical%';
SELECT log_description FROM troubleshooting_logs ORDER BY log_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT failure_time, failure_type, failure_description FROM network_failures WHERE failure_type = 'system_error';
SELECT * FROM network_outages WHERE outage_reason = 'Power Failure';
SELECT start_time, end_time, outage_reason FROM network_outages ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT affected_services FROM network_outages;
SELECT * FROM incident_analysis WHERE analysis_results ILIKE '%resolved%';
SELECT log_time, log_description FROM troubleshooting_logs WHERE log_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_outages ORDER BY start_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT outage_id, outage_type, affected_network FROM network_outages WHERE outage_type = 'Hardware Issue' ORDER BY outage_id ASC;
SELECT reporter_name, report_date, report_details FROM incident_reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_type, location FROM network_equipment WHERE manufacturer = 'Cisco' ORDER BY location ASC;

SELECT ra.outage_id, ra.action_type, ra.action_description, ra.executor_name, no.outage_type, fa.failure_type FROM resolution_actions ra JOIN network_outages no ON ra.outage_id = no.outage_id JOIN failure_analysis fa ON ra.outage_id = fa.outage_id WHERE ra.action_type = 'Preventive Maintenance' ORDER BY ra.action_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_outages JOIN failure_analysis ON network_outages.outage_id = failure_analysis.outage_id WHERE outage_type = 'Planned' AND failure_type = 'Hardware'
SELECT start_time, end_time, affected_network FROM network_outages WHERE outage_id = 5
SELECT reporter_name, report_date, report_details FROM incident_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT manufacturer, location FROM network_equipment WHERE installation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT action_type, executor_name FROM resolution_actions WHERE outage_id = 8
